mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY STORE_ID) RNUM, STORE_ID, STORE_NAME FROM DLOAN_STORE_TBL

SELECT #{storeId} STORE_ID , LIB.LIB_MANAGE_CODE , LIB.LIB_NAME , ODR.ORDER_PRIORITY FROM DLOAN_LIB_ORDER_CONF_TBL ODR , DLOAN_LIB_TBL LIB WHERE ODR.LIB_MANAGE_CODE = LIB.LIB_MANAGE_CODE AND ODR.STORE_ID = #{storeId} ORDER BY ODR.ORDER_PRIORITY ASC
mapper.update: MERGE INTO DLOAN_LIB_ORDER_CONF_TBL USING DUAL ON (STORE_ID = #{storeId} AND LIB_MANAGE_CODE = #{libManageCode} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ORDER_PRIORITY = #{orderPriority}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{userId}, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (STORE_ID, LIB_MANAGE_CODE, ORDER_PRIORITY, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES (#{storeId}, #{libManageCode}, #{orderPriority}, #{userId}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT LIB_MANAGE_CODE , LIB_NAME FROM DLOAN_LIB_TBL WHERE LIB_MANAGE_CODE NOT IN ( SELECT LIB.LIB_MANAGE_CODE FROM DLOAN_LIB_ORDER_CONF_TBL ODR , DLOAN_LIB_TBL LIB WHERE ODR.LIB_MANAGE_CODE = LIB.LIB_MANAGE_CODE AND ODR.STORE_ID = #{storeId} ) AND LIB_MANAGE_CODE IS NOT NULL
